policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: OTK RESOURCE Issuing - Extended"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Input: resource.permitted - permitted resources"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Input: resource.requested - requested resources"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Output: resource.granted - granted resources"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:Include>
            <L7p:PolicyGuid stringValue="23f92900-d19d-4929-a8f1-e152f7fd71ea"/>
        </L7p:Include>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
